#summary MySQL Explain
#sidebar TableOfContents

=Explain=
 * `explain <QUERY>;`


=Profile=
 * `SELECT @@profiling;`<br>查看是否已经打开Profile
 * `SET profiling = 1;`<br>打开Profile
 * `<execute sql query>;`<br>执行SQL语句
 * `show profiles;`<br>查看做过Profile的SQL
 * `show profile for query <N>;`<br>打印对应SQL的Profile数据
